title: Arches National Park: Materials to Loan
body: Materials to Loan      Bringing your class to Arches? Consider reserving one of these ready-made kits to help guide your students' exploration of the park. Lesson plans are designed for middle-school students but most can be adapted up or down by teachers.        Results   Showing results 1-3 of 3    Sort By:  Title Date         Field Trip in a Box: Desert Adaptations    Desert plants, birds, deer, and mountain lions exhibit diverse adaptations for desert survival.    Type:Media For Loan Grade level:Fifth Grade-Twelfth Grade Subjects:Biology: Animals, Biology: Plants, Ecology        Field Trip in a Box: Geologic Changes    Geologic processes cause continual change in the earth's physical features.    Type:Media For Loan Grade level:Fifth Grade-Twelfth Grade Subjects:Earth Science, Geology        Field Trip in a Box: Microorganisms    Microorganisms play a vital role in the high desert ecosystem.    Type:Media For Loan Grade level:Sixth Grade-Tenth Grade Subjects:Biology: Animals, Biology: Plants, Ecology
